reviews.review: A great addition to the Cinematic Universe that Marvel has masterfully built overtime with the great characters presented in the film. The action was decent, great dialogue, as well as being able to see more of Thanos' character than we have previously, but the morals and the values the Avengers held weren't always clear at certpoints of the movie. Other than that, definite recommend.
An epic of a film only topped by Endgame!
I enjoyed it everyone had good screen time and the action as handled so well and it had an amazing ending such a great film with amazing acting

Avengers Infinity War Does What X-men Movies,Under the stewardship
Of Fox Should have already done, but scratched the surface with X-men Days Of Future Past. It truly evolves and reinvents the plot and the possibilities of storytelling In comic book superhero genre. Holds It weight with a fast-paced culminations of 18 movies in the marvel cinematic universe and leaves behind, doubters, or doomsayers of the franchise with a definite major-purposed villian, and the greatest c to b to A-List of hero's that future generations of fans will not forget. Alan Silverstri steps up his game to orchestrate beautiful music for this Masterclass Screenplay filled with longterm quotable's.
Wonderful film. Dark, gritty and held my attention all the way through. Thanos is one of the best villains in movie history.
The movie is good and awesome not better than endgame though

This Movie was just a masterpiece! From the cgi to the story telling. This movie is so greatly paced and all 2 hours were
 just fun and not one scene made me bored. I've watched this movie 6 times, that's how amazing this movie is and honestly it's one of the best movies I've ever seen in cinema.
